thread.section_title: Hotel Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: excellent location
thread.title_full: excellent location - Review of Hotel Kensington, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: kamleshini
title: excellent location
text:
the hotel was whatever we required.
room : clean and comfortable bed
bathroom :clean. good hot shower
wifi : good
location : very strategic. walking distance to Eiffel tower, train station, supermarket. many nearby restaurants.
staff : helpful staff.
others: quiet and peaceful.
definitely recommended.
